title: Hellions e-Sports Club joins the OPL

replies.body: Best of luck to them IMO! Its a ballsy move but one which I hope pays off for them

This is the team I'm going to follow through the good day and even on there bad days and I'll show my Support wherever I can. Best of luck Hellions!

P.S. Please add me TGun I tried adding you when you were on iMmunity or at lest give me a reason why you don't want to add me.
Wonder if team name has anything to do with the Sydney band?
I wouldn't mind seeing Zahe back in the OPL he was one of the stronger jungle Summoners and he used to be in iMmunity intel.
i don't like that name IMO, but i like the team.
What a sht fking team name
